# timeInterval

**Instance Property**

The time interval to create the trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeInterval: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the original time interval that you specified when creating the trigger object. The value in this property isn’t updated as time counts down. To find out when the trigger will fire next, call the [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNTimeIntervalNotificationTrigger/nextTriggerDate()] method.

## Getting the Trigger Information

- **nextTriggerDate()**: The next date at which the trigger conditions are met.
